sentences: Alberto Ardines (born 4 July 1970) is a Spanish musician.
He is working on a new alternative/power metal band called Sauze that he formed with Manuel Ramil, Fernando Mon, and Toni Amboaje.
In 1996, he began taking drumming classes with Fernando Arias a wonderful drummer, who taught him some different styles.
That same year he entered the school of music of Llanera, Asturias, where he spent two years studying drums and musical language.
